item.description:
This is definitely a Networking event and a way to show off your products or services. According to the 50 butts rule " if there are more then 50 Butts in the room I am there" it is a great way to jump start your business or just gather info for growth. I am not sure for the start time or what time it gets done so I put down 8am. I had a hard time finding the times if anyone find the times please write me I will gladly correct it. We can meet together early and leave late if you want or go by yourself this is and event that doesn't require you meetup with at all but it would be nice.

Kathy Bowman
34 Morningside Path
Weymouth MA 02189

The website is http://www.eventmanag...

Boston Convention & Exhibition Center
415 Summer Street
Boston, MA 02189
item.name: New England Expo for Business
